languages.text: "Эксплораторам дарована привилегия быть более независимыми, чем иные наши техносоратники. Однако это создало нам славу нестабильных и плохо контролируемых смутьянов, опасно приблизившихся к вероотступничеству".

traits.locale_text: "Эксплораторам дарована привилегия быть более независимыми, чем иные наши братья. Однако это создало нам славу нестабильных и плохо контролируемых смутьянов, опасно приблизившихся к вероотступничеству".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Explorators are granted the privilege of being more independent than many of our tech-comrades. However, it has earned us a reputation as unstable and poorly controlled troublemakers whose unorthodox views are dangerously close to apostasy."
languages.original_text: "Эксплораторам дарована привилегия быть более независимыми, чем иные наши техносоратники. Однако это создало нам славу нестабильных и плохо контролируемых смутьянов, опасно приблизившихся к вероотступничеству".

traits.locale_text: "The Explorators are granted the privilege of being more independent than many of our brothers. However, it gave us a reputation of unstable and poorly controlled troublemakers whose unorthodox views are dangerously close to apostasy."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Explorators are granted the privilege of being more independent than many of our brothers. However, it gave us a reputation of unstable and poorly controlled troublemakers whose unorthodox views are dangerously close to apostasy."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Explorators are granted the privilege of being more independent than many of our brothers. However, it has earned us a reputation as unstable and poorly controlled troublemakers whose unorthodox views are dangerously close to apostasy."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Explorators are granted the privilege of being more independent than many of our brothers. However, it has earned us a reputation as unstable and poorly controlled troublemakers whose unorthodox views are dangerously close to apostasy."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Explorators are granted the privilege of being more independent than many of our tech-comrades. However, it has earned us a reputation as unstable and poorly controlled troublemakers whose unorthodox views are dangerously close to apostasy."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “与我们的同伴相比，我们开拓者拥有特权，可以从事更加独立的行动。不过，也同样是因为这个原因，人们认为我们很不稳定，不受控制，专门制造麻烦。而且，他们认为我们的非正统的观点很危险，已经接近了叛教的边缘。”
languages.original_text: "Explorators are granted the privilege of being more independent than many of our tech-comrades. However, it has earned us a reputation as unstable and poorly controlled troublemakers whose unorthodox views are dangerously close to apostasy."

traits.locale_text: “与我们的同伴相比，我们开拓者拥有特权，可以从事更加独立的行动。不过，也同样是因为这个原因，人们认为我们很不稳定，不受控制，专门制造麻烦。而且，他们认为我们的非正统的观点很危险，已经接近了叛教的边缘。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «A los exploradores se nos concede el privilegio de ser más independientes que muchos de nuestros tecnocamaradas. Sin embargo, nos ha granjeado la reputación de ser inestables y agitadores descontrolados con opiniones peligrosamente cercanas a la apostasía».
languages.original_text: "Explorators are granted the privilege of being more independent than many of our tech-comrades. However, it has earned us a reputation as unstable and poorly controlled troublemakers whose unorthodox views are dangerously close to apostasy."

traits.locale_text: «A los exploradores se nos concede el privilegio de ser más independientes que muchos de nuestros hermanos. Sin embargo, nos ha granjeado la reputación de ser inestables y agitadores descontrolados con opiniones peligrosamente cercanas a la apostasía».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「探索艦隊は、多くの技術の同志たちよりも自立しているという特権を与えられている。しかし、そのために私たちは、不安定で統制が不十分なトラブルメーカーであり、その異端的な見解は背教に近い危険なものであるとの評価を得ているのだ」
languages.original_text: "Explorators are granted the privilege of being more independent than many of our tech-comrades. However, it has earned us a reputation as unstable and poorly controlled troublemakers whose unorthodox views are dangerously close to apostasy."

traits.locale_text: 「探索艦隊は、多くの技術の同志たちよりも自立しているという特権を与えられている。しかし、そのために私たちは、不安定で統制が不十分なトラブルメーカーであり、その異端的な見解は背教に近い危険なものであるとの評価を得ているのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Exploratoren erhalten das Privileg, unabhängiger zu leben als viele unserer Techkameraden. Das hat uns jedoch den Ruf eingebracht, unberechenbare und zügellose Unruhestifter zu sein, deren unorthodoxe Ansichten der Apostasie gefährlich nah kommen."
languages.original_text: "Explorators are granted the privilege of being more independent than many of our tech-comrades. However, it has earned us a reputation as unstable and poorly controlled troublemakers whose unorthodox views are dangerously close to apostasy."

traits.locale_text: "Exploratoren erhalten das Privileg, unabhängiger zu leben als viele unserer Brüder. Das hat uns jedoch den Ruf eingebracht, unberechenbare und zügellose Unruhestifter zu sein, deren unorthodoxe Ansichten der Apostasie gefährlich nah kommen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Les Explorators ont le privilège d'être plus indépendants que la plupart de nos technoconfrères. En contrepartie, nous sommes réputés pour être des perturbateurs instables et difficilement contrôlables, dont les opinions peu orthodoxes frôlent dangereusement l'apostasie. »
languages.original_text: "Explorators are granted the privilege of being more independent than many of our tech-comrades. However, it has earned us a reputation as unstable and poorly controlled troublemakers whose unorthodox views are dangerously close to apostasy."

traits.locale_text: « Les explorators ont le privilège d'être plus indépendants que la plupart de nos frères. En contrepartie, nous sommes réputés pour être des perturbateurs instables et difficilement contrôlables, dont les opinions peu orthodoxes frôlent dangereusement l'apostasie. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Explorators are granted the privilege of being more independent than many of our tech-comrades. However, it has earned us a reputation as unstable and poorly controlled troublemakers whose unorthodox views are dangerously close to apostasy."

languages.text: "Keşiftörlere çoğu tekno yoldaşımızdan daha bağımsız hareket edebilme imtiyazı bahşedilmiştir. Bu da bizim; olağan dışı görüşleri din dışılığa tehlikeli derecede yakın olan, dengesiz ve kontrol edilemez baş belaları olarak tanınmamıza neden olmuştur."
languages.original_text: "Explorators are granted the privilege of being more independent than many of our tech-comrades. However, it has earned us a reputation as unstable and poorly controlled troublemakers whose unorthodox views are dangerously close to apostasy."

traits.locale_text: "Keşiftörlere çoğu tekno yoldaşımızdan daha bağımsız hareket edebilme imtiyazı bahşedilmiştir. Bu da bizim, olağan dışı görüşleri din dışılığa tehlikeli derecede yakın olan, dengesiz ve kontrol edilemez baş belaları olarak tanınmamıza neden olmuştur ama."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
